original_title: Red Bull Romaniacs: The World's Toughest Hard Enduro Rallye
overview: Because it has to be done. Welcome to the world of survival of the fittest on a dirt bike. Now in its sixth year, the Red Bull Romaniacs Hard Enduro Rallye has become synonymous with the word extreme. Over the course of five days, this race teaches each competitor a lesson about reaching their limit. Disguised behind the beautiful landscape of the Romanian countryside is a 600 kilometer course designed to bring the riders to their knees. Finishing this race is a personal achievement. A challenge and an adventure. The lure of this race attracts over 24 nations separated into four different classes of riders. From the Hobby class to the Pros, Red Bull Romaniacs offers a diverse spectrum of riding for all levels.
title: Red Bull Romaniacs: The World's Toughest Hard Enduro Rallye
